entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
